meta.title: Helpful Information on Using Coin24.com.ua Service
meta.description: In this section, you will find helpful information about the operation of the Coin24.com.ua exchange service.

1_1.title: Logging in with a Google Account:
1_1.p1: You can only log into the manager's account using a specially provided Google account.

list.p1: To do this, go to the <NavLink to="/login" className="default-link">login page</NavLink>;
list.p2: Then click on the Google icon;
list.p3: Enter the six-digit two-factor authentication code;
list.p4: After clicking the "Confirm" button, you will successfully log into your personal account.

2_1.title: How to process a cash requisition?

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/requisitions" className="default-link">Requisitions</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the cash requisition you need;
list.p4: Click the "Details" button;
list.p5: Click the "Start Processing" button;
list.p7: Fill in the attributes of the payout point;

2_2.title: How to cancel a cash requisition?

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/requisitions" className="default-link">Requisitions</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the cash requisition you want to cancel;
list.p4: Click the "Details" button;
list.p5: Then click the "Cancel" button;

3_1.title: How to verify a bank card?

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/card-verification" className="default-link">Card Verification</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Go to the details of the card you need;
list.p4: Make sure the bank card verification request complies with all the rules of the website;
list.p5: Click the "Verify" button;

3_2.title: How to cancel bank card verification?

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/card-verification" className="default-link">Card Verification</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Go to the details of the card you need;
list.p4: Click the "Cancel" button;
list.p5: In the "Note" field, enter the reason for the rejection; Or you can choose a pre-made template of reasons;

3_3.title: How to edit a customer's card?

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the details of the card you need;
list.p3: Click the "Edit" button;
list.p4: In the "Card Number" column, you can change the customer's card number;
list.p5: In the "Expiration Date" column, you can change the expiration date of the customer's card; You can also remove the customer's image;

4.title: 4. Creating a Request for a Customer:

4_1.title: How to create a request for a customer?
4_1.p1: You can create a request for a customer. After creation, the request will automatically appear in the customer's personal account.

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/card-verification" className="default-link">Clients</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the customer you are interested in;
list.p4: Invoke the context menu of the customer you want to create a request for; (The menu appears after clicking on the vertical ellipsis next to the manager's name.);
list.p5: Click "More";
list.p7: Select the direction (pair) on the calculator;
list.p11: Click the checkbox (button) "<NavLink to="/useterms" className="default-link">I have read and agree to the terms of service</NavLink>";

4_1.alert: Attention! You will not be able to create a request in some directions if the customer does not have document verification.

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/reviews" className="default-link">Reviews</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the review you are interested in;
list.p4: Click the checkbox (button) in the "Publication" column.

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/reviews" className="default-link">Reviews</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the review you are interested in;
list.p4: Click the "Edit" button;
list.p5: Edit the review and click the "Save" button.

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/reviews" className="default-link">Reviews</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the review you are interested in;
list.p4: Click the "Delete" button;
list.p5: Confirm your action by clicking the "Yes" button.

6_1.title: How to process/respond to a ticket (Feedback)?

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/feedbacks" className="default-link">Feedback</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the ticket you are interested in;
list.p4: Click the "Details" button to view the ticket details;
list.p5: In the "Your Message" field, you can write a message to the customer or choose from predefined response templates;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/feedbacks" className="default-link">Feedback</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the ticket you want to delete;
list.p4: Click the "Delete" button;
list.p5: Confirm your action by clicking the "Yes" button.

7_1.title: How to block a customer?

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/clients" className="default-link">Customers</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the customer you are interested in;
list.p4: Open the context menu of the customer you want to block; (The menu appears after clicking on the three vertical dots next to the manager's name);
list.p5: Click the "Block" button;
list.p6: Confirm your action by clicking the "Yes" button;

7_1.alert: After blocking, the customer will not be able to access their personal account.

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select the "Profile" option;
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/clients" className="default-link">Customers</NavLink>" tab;
list.p3: Select the customer you want to unblock;
list.p4: Open the context menu of the customer you want to unblock; (The menu appears after clicking on the three vertical dots next to the manager's name);
list.p5: Click the "Unblock" button;
list.p6: Confirm your action by clicking the "Yes" button;

7_3.title: Client Details
7_3.p1: To view detailed information about a client, follow these steps:

list.p1: From the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile."
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/clients" className="default-link">Clients</NavLink>" tab.
list.p3: Invoke the context menu of the client you want to learn additional information about. (The menu appears after clicking on the vertical ellipsis next to the manager's name.)
list.p4: Click on the "Details" button.

list1.title: 1. Requests
list1.p1: On this tab, you can view the client's requests. You can see:

list.p1: Creation date of the request
list.p2: Completion date
list.p3: Payment system. In this column, you see the payment method used by the client.
list.p4: Payment amount, deposit amount, and currency
list.p5: Status. Requests can have different statuses. For example, if the status of a request is "New Request" it means that the client has selected a pair, created it, but hasn't paid yet. If a request has the status "Completed" it means the request was successfully executed. If a request has the status "Card Verification" the client needs to verify the card to complete the request, and so on.

list1.p2: You can learn more details about a request by clicking on the "Details" button.
list1.p3: You will also frequently use filters. In the filters, you can filter requests and search for the ones you need.

list2.title: 2. Referral Levels
list2.p1: On this tab, you can find the client's current referral levels. You can learn about the referral program at <NavLink to="/partners" className="default-link">this link</NavLink>.

list3.title: 3. Cashback Levels
list3.p1: In this section, you can find the client's current cashback level. You can learn about cashback at <NavLink to="/partners" className="default-link">this page</NavLink> in the "Accrual of bonus rewards in the form of cashback" section.

list4.title: 4. Bank Cards
list4.p1: On this tab, you can see the client's bank cards and the status of those cards.

list5.title: 5. Logs
list5.p1: On this tab, you can access the client's logs. Logs are files that contain system information about the server's operation, recording specific actions of a user or program.

list6.title: 6. Block History
list6.p1: In the "Block History" tab, you can find the reason for blocking a client, as well as the date of the block. Managers specify the reason for blocking before blocking a client.

8.title: 8. Templates for Card Verification and Feedback:

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/templates" className="default-link">Response Templates</NavLink>" page;
list.p3: Click on the "Add Template" button;
list.p4: Enter a name for the template in the "Template Name" field;
list.p5: Enter the message in the "Message" field;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/templates" className="default-link">Response Templates</NavLink>" page;
list.p3: Select the template you want to edit;
list.p4: Click the "Edit" button;
list.p5: Rename the template in the "Template Name" field;
list.p6: Modify the message in the "Message" field;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/templates" className="default-link">Response Templates</NavLink>" page;
list.p3: Select the template you want to delete;
list.p4: Click the "Delete" button;
list.p5: Confirm your action by clicking "Yes".

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/templates" className="default-link">Response Templates</NavLink>" page;
list.p3: Switch to the "Feedback" tab;
list.p4: Click the "Add Template" button;
list.p5: Enter a name for the template in the "Template Name" field;
list.p6: Enter the message in the "Message" field;
list.p7: Select a category for the template in the "Category" section;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/templates" className="default-link">Response Templates</NavLink>" page;
list.p3: Switch to the "Feedback" tab;
list.p4: Select the template you want to edit;
list.p5: Click the "Edit" button;
list.p6: Rename the template in the "Template Name" field;
list.p7: Modify the message in the "Message" field;
list.p8: You can change the template category in the dropdown menu;

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/templates" className="default-link">Response Templates</NavLink>" page;
list.p3: Switch to the "Feedback" tab;
list.p4: Select the template you want to delete;
list.p5: Click the "Delete" button;

9_1.title: How to change your name and surname?
9_1.p1: You can change this information in your personal account;
9_1.p2: To change your name or surname:

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/account" className="default-link">Personal Account Settings</NavLink>" (gear icon);
list.p3: In the "First Name" field, change your name to the desired one;
list.p4: In the "Last Name" field, change your surname to the desired one;
list.p5: Click the "Save" button.

9_2.title: How to subscribe or unsubscribe from the newsletter?
9_2.p1: Coin24 periodically sends emails to its customers. If you do not want to receive emails from this service, you can unsubscribe from the newsletter:

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/account" className="default-link">Personal Account Settings</NavLink>" (gear icon);
list.p3: Select the "Notifications" tab;
list.p4: Click on the checkbox next to "Newsletter". The newsletter includes notifications about promotions and greetings or changes to the service conditions;
list.p5: Click on the checkbox next to "Service Messages". Service messages are technical notifications about the status of your application or information related to your account;

9_2.p2: You can also subscribe to the Coin24.com.ua service newsletter.

9_3.title: How to add a profile photo (avatar)?
9_3.p1: To add a profile photo (avatar) to your profile, follow these steps:

list.p1: In the <NavLink to="/" className="default-link">main menu of the website</NavLink>, select "Profile";
list.p2: Go to the "<NavLink to="/panel/account" className="default-link">Personal Account Settings</NavLink>" (gear icon);
list.p3: Click the "Change Photo" button;
list.p4: Select the photo you want to set;

9_3.alert: Note: Your photo should not exceed 5 MB.

10.title: 10. Contact Us (Feedback Form).
10.p1: To send a message to the administration of the exchange service, follow these steps:
10.p2: To change your name or surname:

list.p1: Go to the <NavLink to="/contacts" className="default-link">Contacts</NavLink> tab;
list.p2: Enter your name in the "First Name" field;
list.p3: Enter your surname in the "Last Name" field;
list.p4: Enter your email address in the "E-mail" field;
list.p5: Write your message to the administration of the website in the "Your Message" field;
list.p6: Then select the direction "Bank Transfer" or "Cash Payment" depending on the direction of the exchange your inquiry is related to;
list.p7: If you chose "Cash Payment", select the country and city of the exchange you are interested in;
list.alert1: If you are logged in to your account, the "First Name", "Last Name", and "E-mail" fields will be automatically filled in;
list.alert2: After sending the message, wait for a response to the email address you provided.
